        This takes the basic information about an appointment and really just checks that the times make logical sense.

        Returns:

      • modifyValidator

        public static boolean modifyValidator​(int id,
                                      java.lang.String title,
                                      java.lang.String description,
                                      java.lang.String location,
                                      java.lang.String type,
                                      java.sql.Timestamp start,
                                      java.sql.Timestamp end,
                                      int customer_id,
                                      int user_id,
                                      int contact_id)
        This is used when adding an appointment and checks calls the appointmentValidator to perform basic time checks but then calls conflictChecker to make sure there aren't any conflicting appointments for the customer. The primary difference is that this takes the appointment id so that the conflict checker doesn't fire for minor changes like shifting the appointment by 15 minutes or so.
        Parameters:
        id - Used to check other appointments against this appointment and ensure that conflictChecker isn't run against itself
        title - For future use
        description - For future use
        location - For future use
        type - For future use
        start - Timestamp of the appointment start time
        end - Timestamp of the appointment end time
        customer_id - For future use
        user_id - For future use
        contact_id - Used to check this appointment against other appointments by the same customer
        Returns:
        Boolean indicating whether or not the validation checks passed or failed

      • conflictChecker

        public static boolean conflictChecker​(java.time.LocalDateTime apptStart,
                                      java.time.LocalDateTime apptEnd,
                                      java.time.LocalDateTime aStart,
                                      java.time.LocalDateTime aEnd,
                                      int aID)
        This lookes for overlaps between appointments for the same customer to ensure that the customer doesn't have multiple appointments at roughly the same time.
        Parameters:
        apptStart -
        apptEnd -
        aStart -
        aEnd -
        aID -
        Returns:
        Boolean indicating if the checks passed or failed
